des: "This is the best marinade I have ever tasted. It is my mother-in-law's recipe. We love it. Marinate your meat at least four hours. This recipe makes enough for two steaks."
ins:
Whisk together the pineapple juice, soy sauce, lime juice, cumin, and garlic in a small bowl.
Marinate up to 2 pounds of meat in the marinade for at least 4 hours before using.
